title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather, document, and prioritize user preferences and behavior patterns that the PersonalizedUXEngine should consider. Identify key metrics for each preference/pattern to ensure accurate and dynamic adjustment of user interfaces. Include guidelines for handling conflict resolution between multiple preferences and patterns. Collaborate with relevant team members throughout this process.

title: Design Architecture of PersonalizedUXEngine
description: Develop a high-level design for the PersonalizedUXEngine, considering aspects like frontend, backend, and database integration.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for User Preferences Input
description: Design and implement the frontend interface where users can input their preferences.

title: Implement Backend Logic for User Behavior Pattern Analysis
description: Create the backend logic to analyze user behavior patterns and adjust interfaces accordingly.

title: Establish Database Scheme for User Data Storage
description: Design and set up the necessary database schema to store user data.

title: Integrate Frontend with Backend and Database
description: Connect the frontend interface to the backend logic and database schema.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Preferences Input
Implement Backend Logic for User Behavior Pattern Analysis
Establish Database Scheme for User Data Storage

title: Write Test Cases for PersonalizedUXEngine Functionality
description: Create test cases to ensure the engine's functionality works as intended.
dependencies: Integrate Frontend with Backend and Database

title: Conduct Functional Testing of PersonalizedUXEngine
description: Run the test cases to verify that the engine functions correctly.
dependencies: Write Test Cases for PersonalizedUXEngine Functionality

title: Refactor and Optimize PersonalizedUXEngine as Needed
description: Improve the engine's performance based on testing results.

title: Document PersonalizedUXEngine Design and Implementation
description: Create documentation detailing the design, implementation, and usage of the PersonalizedUXEngine.
dependencies: Integrate Frontend with Backend and Database
